Description of incident: Some patients who were treated at an outpatient facility between May 1 of 2012 and January 31 of 2013 had their information attached to emails that went out to an unspecified organization or organizations.  Three emails that were not secure were sent on October 29 and November 1 of 2012 and February 4, 2013.  Patient names, Social Security numbers, account numbers, dates of birth, home phone numbers, and reasons for outpatient physical therapy services may have been exposed.
